workflow:
zLiberty_StopServer_p Stop the provisioned Liberty server 1.0 IBM
zosLiberty Liberty for z/OS Version 9 WLP
&variables;
Copy Provisioning Script Copy script to temp directory with unique name
Copy Script Copy the wlp-provisioning.sh script Copy the wlp-provisioning.sh script to the tmp directory with a name unique to this workflow 1 true
templates/wlp-provisioning.sh ${instance-TEMP_DIR}/wlp-${instance-WLP_USER}-${_workflow-softwareServiceInstanceName}-wlp-provisioning.sh
Set Script Permissions Set the permissions of the newly copied script Chmod 755 on the newly copied script 1 true
chmod 755 ${instance-TEMP_DIR}/wlp-${instance-WLP_USER}-${_workflow-softwareServiceInstanceName}-wlp-provisioning.sh
shell-JCL
Stop the Server Stop any existing Liberty servers for this user
Stop the Server from USS Submit script to stop any existing Liberty servers for this user
${copyScript.stepState}=="Complete" Only perform check if previous step has completed
Set state to Skipped if START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK does not equal TRUE
Skip if START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK does not equal TRUE ${instance_START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK} == "TRUE" Skipped
Submitting script to stop the server. 1 true
if [ "${instance-WLP_USER}" = $(whoami) ]; then ${instance-TEMP_DIR}/wlp-${instance-WLP_USER}-${_workflow-softwareServiceInstanceName}-wlp-provisioning.sh --stop else su -s ${instance-WLP_USER} -c "${instance-TEMP_DIR}/wlp-${instance-WLP_USER}-${_workflow-softwareServiceInstanceName}-wlp-provisioning.sh --stop" fi
shell-JCL
Stop the Server from Console Issue a stop command for the server. If the command fails, issue a cancel
Issue stop command Issue a stop command for the server. $!{instance-CONSOLE_RUN_AS_ID} $!{instance-CONSOLE_APPROVAL_ID}
${copyScript.stepState}=="Complete" Only perform check if previous step has completed
Set state to Skipped if START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK does not equal TRUE
Skip if START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK does not equal TRUE ${instance_START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK} != "TRUE" Skipped
Submitting script to stop the server. 1 true
PUT /zosmf/restconsoles/consoles/${instance-CONSOLE_NAME}
{ "cmd" : "STOP ${_workflow-softwareServiceInstanceName}", "unsol-key" : "DUMMY", "unsol-detect-sync" : "Y", "unsol-detect-timeout" : "10", "system" : "${_workflow-systemName}" }
200
Check Server Status Check to see if the server job is still running $!{instance-CONSOLE_RUN_AS_ID} $!{instance-CONSOLE_APPROVAL_ID}
${copyScript.stepState}=="Complete" Only perform check if previous step has completed
Set state to Skipped if START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK does not equal TRUE
Skip if START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK does not equal TRUE ${instance_START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK} != "TRUE" Skipped
Submitting script to stop the server. 1 true
PUT /zosmf/restconsoles/consoles/${instance-CONSOLE_NAME}
{ "cmd" : "d a,${_workflow-softwareServiceInstanceName}", "sol-key" : "NOT FOUND", "system" : "${_workflow-systemName}" }
200 ["sol-key-detected"]
Issue Cancel Command Cancel the server if it is still running $!{instance-CONSOLE_RUN_AS_ID} $!{instance-CONSOLE_APPROVAL_ID}
${copyScript.stepState}=="Complete" Only perform check if previous step has completed
Set state to Skipped if START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK does not equal TRUE
Skip if START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK does not equal TRUE ${instance_START_SERVER_AS_STARTED_TASK} != "TRUE" Skipped
Only execute it SERVER_STOP_STATUS is false ${instance-SERVER_STOP_STATUS} != "false" Skipped
Submitting script to stop the server. 1 true
PUT /zosmf/restconsoles/consoles/${instance-CONSOLE_NAME}
{ "cmd" : "C ${_workflow-softwareServiceInstanceName}", "system" : "${_workflow-systemName}" }
200
Remove Temp Files Remove the temp files created by this workflow Remove the files copied to ${instance-TEMP_DIR}/wlp-${instance-WLP_USER}-${_workflow-softwareServiceInstanceName}-* 1 true
rm ${instance-TEMP_DIR}/wlp-${instance-WLP_USER}-${_workflow-softwareServiceInstanceName}-*
shell-JCL
